body_html: @jeichel-miovision @sugartom I wasn't able to upgrade the cuda in the past due to some architectural issues. Basically the TX1 says it's using aarch64 and so even with the arm64 deb I couldn't install it. Perhaps a successful upgrade of CUDA would make it possible to install tensorflow above v1.0, which would enable a lot of other operations like quantization. thanks to @jeichel-miovision in advance for trying out!

body: @jeichel-miovision @sugartom I wasn't able to upgrade the cuda in the past due to some architectural issues. Basically the TX1 says it's using aarch64 and so even with the arm64 deb I couldn't install it. Perhaps a successful upgrade of CUDA would make it possible to install tensorflow above v1.0, which would enable a lot of other operations like quantization. thanks to @jeichel-miovision in advance for trying out!
